mapper.select: SELECT p.prod_no, p.corp_no, p.trade_type, p.title, p.type, p.status_cd, p.entrance_pwd, p.unit_pwd, p.phone_no1, p.phone_no2, p.unit_no, p.etc, p.deposit, p.monthly_rent, p.sale_price, p.deposit_total, p.rent_total, p.premium_fee, p.premium_yn, p.direction_cd, p.rcm_cd, p.room_cd, p.bath_cd, p.move_in_cd, p.prod_addr, p.property_x, p.property_y, p.prod_road_addr, p.prod_dtl_addr, p.prod_mng_user, p.new_dtm, p.reg_user_id, p.chg_user_id, r.remark_cd FROM tb_product_info p LEFT JOIN tb_product_remarks_info r ON p.prod_no = r.prod_no WHERE p.corp_no = #{corpNo} AND p.use_yn = '1'
mapper.update: UPDATE tb_product_info SET new_dtm = NOW(), chg_user_id = ( SELECT user_no FROM tb_user_info WHERE user_no = #{userNo} ) WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo}
UPDATE tb_product_info SET use_yn = '0', chg_dtm = NOW() WHERE prod_no = #{prodNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tb_product_info ( corp_no, trade_type, title, type, status_cd, entrance_pwd, unit_pwd, phone_no1, phone_no2, unit_no, etc, deposit, monthly_rent, deposit_and_monthly_rent, sale_pricd_and_depo_and_rent, deposit_and_monthly_rent_and_pre_fee, sale_price, deposit_total, rent_total, premium_fee, premium_yn, direction_cd, rcm_cd, room_cd, bath_cd, move_in_cd, prod_addr, property_x, property_y, prod_road_addr, prod_dtl_addr, prod_mng_user, new_dtm, reg_user_id, chg_user_id ) VALUES ( #{corpNo}, #{tradeType}, #{title}, #{type}, #{statusCd}, #{entrancePwd}, #{unitPwd}, #{phoneNo1}, #{phoneNo2}, #{unitNo}, #{etc}, #{deposit}, #{monthlyRent}, #{depositAndMonthlyRent}, #{salePricdAndDepoAndRent}, #{depositAndMonthlyRentAndPreFee}, #{salePrice}, #{depositTotal}, #{rentTotal}, #{premiumFee}, #{premiumYn}, #{directionCd}, #{rcmCd}, #{roomCd}, #{bathCd}, #{moveInCd}, #{prodAddr}, #{propertyX}, #{propertyY}, #{prodRoadAddr}, #{prodDtlAddr}, #{prodMngUser}, #{newDtm}, #{regUserId}, #{chgUserId} )

insert.foreach: INSERT INTO tb_product_remarks_info (prod_no, use_yn, remark_cd, reg_dtm) VALUES (#{remark.prodNo}, #{remark.useYn}, #{remark.remarkCd}, #{remark.regDtm})
INSERT INTO tb_product_img_info (prod_no, mng_file_nm, real,file_nm, use_yn, reg_dtm) VALUES (#{image.prodNo}, #{image.mngFileNm}, #{image.realFileNm}, #{image.useYn}, #{image.regDtm})
